posts.post_title: T222 Earl Hamilton Short Print - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have this T222 Earl Hamilton short print available. Card appears miscut and has an O.L. Felger backstamp but looks really nice. Asking $SOLD for him.

Available via PM to discuss or comment below.

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
